pr_title: fix: fail AVRO/Protobuf/JSON Schema statements if SR is missing

timeline.message: fix: fail statement eagerly if it creates a schema inference topic without schema registry

timeline.body: Whoa, this is so useful! I've been using all sorts of crazy workarounds since I didn't know about this. Thanks for the tip 😅

replies.bodyText: tbh, this isn't great practice 😅 but I didn't want to distract from the fix. In general tests shouldn't depend on ordering because then you can't parallelize them. Hopefully I'll have time to debug why this is happening, but I spent like 20min and couldn't immediately figure it out
